address.addressline1: Archives & Special Collections at the Thomas J. Dodd Research Center

profiledesc.creation: Inventory encoded by Betsy Pittman in June 2006.

did.head: Overview of the Collection
did.repository: Archives & Special Collections at the Thomas J. Dodd Research Center.
did.abstract: The collection contains the professional papers of Dr. Ladd, professor of political science and director of the Roper Center at the University of Connecticut.

bioghist.head: Biography
bioghist.p: Professor at University of Connecticut 1969-1999. Died 1999.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The collection contains correspondence, reports, research notes and materials, publications, class materials, survey data and analysis all pertaining to Ladd's research on American politics. The collection has been inventoried and reboxed as necessary.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: Archives & Special Collections has a substantial collection of materials pertaining to survey and public polling research as well as the University, its history, administration, faculty, staff and students. For detailed information on these collections please contact the curator or ask at the reference desk.

controlaccess.head: Index Terms
controlaccess.p: This record series is indexed under the following controlled access subject terms.

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions on Access
accessrestrict.p: There are no access restrictions on this collection.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use
userestrict.p: Permission to publish from these Papers must be obtained in writing from both the University of Connecticut Libraries and the owner(s) of the copyright.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Item description, #:#], Everett Carll Ladd, Jr. Papers. Archives & Special Collections at the Thomas J. Dodd Research Center, University of Connecticut Libraries.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The collection was donated by Cynthia Ladd in 2000.
